dependencies.description:
Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning
sequencing reads to long reference sequences
dependencies.name: bowtie2

dependencies.description: A quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.
dependencies.name: fastqc

dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation
dependencies.name: java

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description:
Tandem Repeats Finder is a program to locate and display tandem repeats
in DNA sequences. Note: A manual download is required for TRF. Spack
will search your current directory for the download file. Alternatively,
add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find it. For instructions on
how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
dependencies.name: trf

dependencies.description: A flexible read trimming tool for Illumina NGS data.
dependencies.name: trimmomatic

description:
Quality control tool on metagenomic and metatranscriptomic sequencing
data, especially data from microbiome experiments
name: py-kneaddata

variants.description: Enable support for input files in BAM format
variants.name: bam

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enable support for Tandem Repeats Finder
variants.name: trf
